title: Added distributed docs on NCCL2 backend and its functions as well as distributed.launch module
body_html:
Add the following things into the distributed doc.

  • NCCL backend support
  • NCCL backend multi-gpu functions
  • torch.distributed.launch module

Need to make torch.distributed.launch a function so that the doc build can include it.

Changed all the function comments and previous launch module comments as well so that it looks good. Made sure make html doesn't complain anything about the the distributed doc.

Previewed on my own computer and it looks good
body_text:
Add the following things into the distributed doc.

NCCL backend support
NCCL backend multi-gpu functions
torch.distributed.launch module

Need to make torch.distributed.launch a function so that the doc build can include it.
Changed all the function comments and previous launch module comments as well so that it looks good.  Made sure make html doesn't complain anything about the the distributed doc.
Previewed on my own computer and it looks good
body:
Add the following things into the distributed doc.

- NCCL backend support
- NCCL backend multi-gpu functions
- torch.distributed.launch module

Need to make torch.distributed.launch a function so that the doc build can include it.

Changed all the function comments and previous launch module comments as well so that it looks good.  Made sure make html doesn't complain anything about the the distributed doc. 

Previewed on my own computer and it looks good
